Hilton Hotels

Distance to venue 5km

Hotel information

This hotel enjoys a convenient location in the centre of Filderstadt-Berhausen and offers ideal connections to the area’s main transport hubs being 1.7 miles from Stuttfart airport. All 139 rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed with guests having access to 24 hour room service and free Wi-Fi internet. The hotel restaurant has an open kitchen and offers delicious, fresh and healthy dishes as well as a large breakfast buffet in the morning.

Hotel facilities

  • Air Conditioning
  • Breakfast Buffet
  • Computer Business Centre
  • Currency Exchange

Qualifications

ID&T Travel reserves the right to change the prices and packages without the visitor’s permission and to make changes to the website if the situation so requires. All flight and travel information is subject to change in the interim.

Published travel sums

Article 2, subsection 2: ID&T Travel’s offer is without engagement and ID&T Travel may revoke it if necessary. ID&T Travel must revoke an offer as quickly as possible and in any event within eight office hours after acceptance, stating its reason for doing so. Revocation in order to correct errors in the calculation of the total travel costs is permitted; revocation in order to increase the total travel costs must be in compliance with the requirements contained in Article 4 of the Travel Terms and Conditions of the Dutch Association of Travel Organizations.
